items.sentence: Please introduce me to the attractive girl who is talking with Tom.
The first time I came to Boston, this restaurant wasn\'t even here.
For as long as Tom could remember, his parents had been overweight.
I almost got killed when I went into the burning house to save Tom.
Tom hated to bother Mary so late at night, but it was an emergency.
Tom needs to renew his passport before the fifteenth of next month.
Tom stepped out of the shower and wrapped a towel around his waist.
I usually take a shower after I play tennis, but today I couldn\'t.
I was just wondering if maybe Tom was the one who started the fire.
I wonder why Tom sang that song, even though Mary asked him not to.
